decks.notes: The deck aims to apply early pressure on the opponent while disrupting their game plan with countermagic and land destruction. By efficiently using cards like Delver of Secrets, Tarmogoyf, and Nimble Mongoose alongside disruptive spells like Force of Will and Daze, the deck can quickly close out games while countering threats and disrupting opponents' plays. The deck's mana base allows for consistent casting of its spells and the use of Wasteland to disrupt opponents' mana bases. Overall, the deck focuses on tempo and aggression to secure victories in Legacy 1 vs 1 matchups.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly overwhelm the opponent with a combination of aggressive creatures like Gravecrawler and Bloodghast, while also utilizing sacrifice effects like Cabal Therapy and Goblin Bombardment to control the board and deal damage directly to the opponent. Lingering Souls provides additional threats, while Bitterblossom helps generate constant tokens to sacrifice. Thoughtseize and Inquisition of Kozilek help disrupt the opponent's game plan, allowing the deck to maintain pressure and finish the game quickly. The deck aims to outpace the opponent and win through a combination of creature aggression and direct damage.

The main concept of this Legacy Goblins deck is to quickly flood the board with aggressive goblin creatures and overwhelm the opponent. Using cards like Aether Vial and Goblin Lackey to bring out creatures for free, along with powerful Goblin lords like Goblin Warchief and Goblin Chieftain to pump up your team, allows for fast and explosive plays. This deck also includes disruptive elements like Stingscourger and Gempalm Incinerator to control the opponent's board while pushing through damage. The inclusion of cards like Wasteland and Rishadan Port helps to disrupt the opponent's mana base and slow them down, giving the goblins an advantage in the race.

The main focus of this deck is to control the game through countering opponent's spells, utilizing top-deck manipulation with Sensei's Divining Top and Counterbalance, and maintaining board presence with planeswalkers like Jace, the Mind Sculptor and Elspeth, Knight-Errant. The deck also includes removal spells like Swords to Plowshares and Terminus to handle threats, along with card advantage engines like Snapcaster Mage. The mana base is optimized for consistency and access to both white and blue spells, with additional utility lands like Karakas for protection.

The deck focuses on using powerful combo cards like Show and Tell and Griselbrand to quickly assemble a game-winning board state. It utilizes a mix of fast mana sources like Lotus Petal and rituals to power out its combo pieces early on while using disruption like Thoughtseize and Force of Will to protect its game plan. The deck is designed to quickly generate a high storm count with cards like Tendrils of Agony and win the game in a single explosive turn.

This deck focuses on controlling the opponent's plays through counter spells, removal, and utilizing the Counterbalance and Sensei's Divining Top combo to manipulate the top of the library. It aims to stabilize the board with cards like Terminus and Swords to Plowshares before eventually winning the game with Entreat the Angels or by controlling the game with planeswalkers like Jace, the Mind Sculptor. The deck also has utility lands like Karakas and Wasteland to disrupt the opponent's game plan. The key is to outvalue and outmaneuver the opponent through patience and strategic decision-making.

The main focus of this deck is to be aggressive and control the game tempo by using cheap, efficient spells to disrupt the opponent's game plan while also applying pressure with creatures like Tarmogoyf, Nimble Mongoose, and Delver of Secrets. The deck aims to quickly close out the game by maximizing damage output and controlling the board with disruption spells like Stifle, Force of Will, and Daze. The mana base is designed to support the deck's color requirements and provide consistency in casting spells.

The deck focuses on maintaining control of the game through a combination of counterspells, removal spells, and card advantage. By using cards like Force of Will, Swords to Plowshares, and Counterbalance, the player aims to disrupt their opponent's game plan while also controlling the board. The deck also includes cards like Jace, the Mind Sculptor and Snapcaster Mage to provide additional card advantage and threats on the battlefield. The goal is to gradually out-value the opponent and secure the win through powerful finishers like Entreat the Angels.

The deck focuses on aggressive plays and disrupting opponents through a combination of efficient creatures and removal spells. It aims to quickly develop a strong board presence with creatures like Knight of the Reliquary and Thalia, Guardian of Thraben, while using cards like Swords to Plowshares and Umezawa's Jitte to deal with opposing threats. The deck also uses Green Sun's Zenith to tutor for specific creatures like Gaddock Teeg or Scavenging Ooze, providing flexibility in different matchups. Additionally, the deck utilizes mana acceleration with Noble Hierarch and mana denial with cards like Wasteland to control the pace of the game.

The key concept of this Aggro MUD deck is to quickly ramp up mana using Grim Monolith and Metalworker to cast powerful artifacts like Wurmcoil Engine, Blightsteel Colossus, and Sundering Titan. Chalice of the Void disrupts opponents' spells, while Lodestone Golem and Phyrexian Revoker control the board. Crucible of Worlds and Wasteland provide land disruption, and Lightning Greaves protect key creatures. The deck aims to overwhelm opponents with a mix of threats and disruption, taking advantage of its high mana potential and powerful artifact creatures.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly fill the graveyard with powerful creatures using cards like Entomb and Careful Study, then bring them back into play with spells like Animate Dead and Reanimate. The deck also includes disruptive elements like Thoughtseize and Force of Will to protect the combo. With a focus on powerful creatures like Jin-Gitaxias and Griselbrand, the goal is to overwhelm the opponent with a strong board presence and tempo advantage. The deck is built around the synergy between reanimation spells and high-impact creatures to quickly close out games.

The deck focuses on utilizing fast and efficient creatures, along with disruptive spells, to apply early pressure and control the game. It includes powerful planeswalkers like Jace, the Mind Sculptor, along with versatile cards like Green Sun's Zenith and Swords to Plowshares. The deck also features a solid mana base with a mix of fetch lands and utility lands like Wasteland and Karakas. By combining aggression, disruption, and mana efficiency, the deck aims to overwhelm opponents quickly and maintain control of the game.

The deck focuses on aggressive creature-based strategies while disrupting opponent's plans with Thalia, Guardian of Thraben and Gaddock Teeg. It includes Green Sun's Zenith to tutor for key creatures like Knight of the Reliquary and Thrun, the Last Troll. The deck also packs removal in the form of Swords to Plowshares and Path to Exile, as well as protection with Mother of Runes. The mana base is carefully crafted with a mix of fetch lands and utility lands like Gaea's Cradle and Karakas to support the aggressive game plan.

This deck focuses on utilizing powerful green creatures, disruptive white spells, and land destruction to create a fast and aggressive strategy. By combining efficient creatures with versatile removal spells like Swords to Plowshares, and the ramp provided by cards like Green Sun's Zenith and Noble Hierarch, the deck aims to quickly overwhelm the opponent with a combination of creature beatdown and resource denial. The inclusion of cards like Knight of the Reliquary and Terravore further enhances the deck's ability to apply pressure and close out games quickly.

This deck aims to aggressively pressure opponents with efficient creatures like Thalia, Guardian of Thraben and Knight of the Reliquary, while disrupting their game plan with cards like Swords to Plowshares and Gaddock Teeg. The deck also utilizes Green Sun's Zenith to tutor for key creatures like Scavenging Ooze and Qasali Pridemage. The inclusion of cards like Sylvan Library and Garruk Relentless provide card advantage and additional value. The mana base is carefully constructed to support the deck's aggressive strategy while also disrupting opponents with cards like Wasteland and Karakas.

This deck focuses on putting pressure on the opponent with aggressive creatures like Tarmogoyf, Nimble Mongoose, and Delver of Secrets while disrupting their game plan with cards like Stifle, Spell Pierce, and Force of Will. The deck also aims to control the board with removal spells like Lightning Bolt and Wasteland, all while ensuring card advantage and efficient deck filtering with Ponder, Brainstorm, and fetch lands. The key strategy is to apply early pressure, disrupt the opponent's plays, and maintain card advantage to win the game quickly and efficiently.
